con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="ValidatePayment" targetNamespace="http://oracle.com/sca/soapservice/e2e-1201-composites/ValidatePayment/ValidatePayment" xmlns:tns="http://oracle.com/sca/soapservice/e2e-1201-composites/ValidatePayment/ValidatePayment" xmlns:inp1="http://www.oracle.com/soasample" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:documentation> <abstractWSDL>http://localhost:8001/soa-infra/services/order/ValidatePayment!1.4/WSDLs/ValidatePayment.wsdl</abstractWSDL> </wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.oracle.com/soasample" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8001/soa-infra/services/order/ValidatePayment!1.4*soa_8f85c5c5-7efd-41d8-8e91-9059cb3caa46/ValidatePayment?XSD=../Schemas/CanonicalOrder.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="requestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="inp1:PaymentInfo"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="replyMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="inp1:PaymentStatus"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="validatePaymentPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="Validate"> <wsdl:input message="tns:requestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:replyMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="validatePaymentBinding" type="tns:validatePaymentPortType"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="Validate"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="Validate"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ValidatePayment"> <wsdl:port name="validatePaymentPort" binding="tns:validatePaymentBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8001/soa-infra/services/order/ValidatePayment!1.4*soa_8f85c5c5-7efd-41d8-8e91-9059cb3caa46/ValidatePayment"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.oracle.com/soasample" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.oracle.com/soasample"> <xs:element name="Order" type="OrderType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The canonical order element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OrderAck" type="OrderAckType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The canonical order ack element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentInfo" type="PaymentType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The canonical order element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentStatus" type="PaymentStatusType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The canonical order element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Shipping" type="ShippingType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The canonical order element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InventoryQuery" type="InventoryQueryType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The inventory element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InventoryResponse" type="InventoryType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The inventory element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalOrderAmount" type="MoneyType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The total order amount element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="MoneyType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:double"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OrderNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="NameType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="AddressType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="FirstName" type="NameType"/> <xs:element name="LastName" type="NameType" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="3"> <xs:element name="AddressLine"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="180"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:element name="City"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="State"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ZipCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PhoneNumber" minOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ItemType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This information will be populated from INVDTA/ITMMSTP from bronze where product_id = isku</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SKU"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Column ISKU</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Quantity" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="UnitPrice" type="MoneyType"/> <xs:element name="Brand" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Column BRAND</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Model" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Column MODEL</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Category" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Column CATEG</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:totalDigits value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Description" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ShippingSpeedType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Standard"/> <xs:enumeration value="Twoday"/> <xs:enumeration value="Oneday"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ShippingProviderType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ShippingProviderType for now only contains the name of the Provider - we may expand later</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Name" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the shipping provider for packing service - FedEx ups, us postal</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OrderType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OrderNumber" type="OrderNumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="SessionID" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OrderDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Billing" type="PaymentType" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="Shipping" type="ShippingType" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="Email" minOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Items"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Item" type="ItemType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Status" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CardPaymentType"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[0-5]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CardNum"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ExpireDate"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CardName"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BillingAddress" type="AddressType"/> <xs:element name="AuthorizationDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="AuthorizationAmount" type="MoneyType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ShippingMethodType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:pattern value="[1-3]{1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ShippingType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OrderNumber" type="OrderNumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Address" type="AddressType"/> <xs:element name="ShippingSpeed" type="ShippingSpeedType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ShippingProvider" type="ShippingProviderType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ShipMethod" type="ShippingMethodType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Status" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OrderAckType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OrderNumber" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Status" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="InventoryQueryType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Category" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:totalDigits value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="InventoryType"> <xs:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="SKU"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalQuantity" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
